channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024020863
item.description:
Report X-2024020863

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The outer package does not have any damage to the box. The box appears to have been dropped which caused one of the bottles of methanol to break. DescribePack: Broken DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a hazmat tote with a hazmat bag and it was placed in the damaged hazmat cage for evaluation

item.title: Report X-2024020674
item.description:
Report X-2024020674

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-19
  • City: BURLINGTON
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and sent to van line 300, handlers noticed box was leaking then placed in hazmat tote and brought to QA for inspection DescribePack: Top of cap shattered off causing foil seal to open and discharge in box DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in hazmat tote and isolated from other boxes
